column1: robert l. brown| robert l. brown
column6: 2015 at golden living center in jefferson city
column7: mo. he was born on march 10
column8: 1935 in claire co. mi the son of arthur brown and viola (walker) brown. robert was of the baptist faith. he was a heavy machinery operator and also an over the road truck driver. he is survived by 2 sons
column9: rex brown and kenneth provett; 1 daughter
column12: patricia albbe and helen mc. bride. he was preceded in death by 1 brother and 3 sisters. a private family burial will be at the old california city cemetery on wednesday
column14: 2015 at 3:00 p. m. arrangements are under the direction of bowlin-cantriel funeral services
